title: The Ark Returned to Israel
summary: 1 Samuel 6 tells how the Philistines return the Ark to Israel. After suffering plagues, they place the Ark on a cart with offerings and send it to Beth Shemesh. Some Israelites look inside the Ark and are struck down.

faq.question: Why did the Philistines return the Ark?
faq.answer: Because they were afflicted with plagues and believed the Ark was causing their suffering.

faq.question: What mistake did the people of Beth Shemesh make?
faq.answer: They looked inside the Ark, which was forbidden, and many were struck down by God.
